markdown: ###### Major Positive reputation gained with the [Huana](/huana/) | rewardname2 = Fail to gain support from the Wahaki tribe | reward2 = {{cp2|2000}};Moderate Negative reputation lost with the [Huana](/huana/) | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = The Shadow Under Neketaka | conc = A Shrewd Proposition;Clearing Out Crookspur;Cruel Cargo | internalname = FCT_QST_04_The_Wahaki | guid = 3a3fc055-f424-4e13-9486-8984d5db4553 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [faction quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsFactionQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Queen Onekaza](/queenOnekazaIi/) has asked me to recruit the [Wahaki](/wahaki/) tribe to her cause. Though confrontational and divisive, she feels that the tribe will prove a critical ally in the contentious days ahead. The tribe can be found on [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/), a fiercely protected island of dense jungle, to the northwest of Neketaka. ## Walkthrough * Leave Neketaka and head northwest towards Ori o Koīki. Once you get to the island, head east and speak to [Kipeha](/kipeha/) - a tribe member keeping guard of the lift up to the village. She cautions you to head back to your ship (strangely in past-tense). Naturally, she won't be willing to let a bunch of strangers in, but you can convince her with one of the following: ** {{cp2|1000}} and either the Deadfire Archipelago background or [Streetwise](/streetwise/) 5 ([Huana](/huana/): Minor Positive) ** [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 8 or [Insight](/insight/) 9 to tell her that you desire a "deeper understanding of their tribe" (Pro-Huana) - the checks following don't matter. ** Tell her that the Queen wishes an alliance with the Wahaki - using the treaty phrase "Over crumbling mountains, across blighted seas". If you fail to recall the phrase, she'll fire an arrow at your head (you can dodge it with [Athletics](/athletics/) 7) and put the tribe on alert. ** If you've started the concurrent quest [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/), you can warn them that the [Crookspur](/crookspur/) slavers seek vengeance against the Wahiki tribe - the checks following don't matter. * Once you gain access to the village talk to the ranga, [Ruāsare](/ruasare/), to learn her terms: Wipe out the slavers at [Crookspur](/crookspur/) and in return, she will support the crown. ** After clearing out the slavers, and in the wake of Rauataian warships taking over Crookspur island, you have to pass a skill check (4 [Streetwise](/streetwise/) / 5 [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/)) for her to accept the authority of the Queen. * This starts the quest [Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/). Complete this quest then return to the queen for your reward; {{cp2|2500}} and Major Positive reputation with Huana. * Otherwise, if you failed to gain access, started combat with the tribe, or if [Ruāsare](/ruasare/) is killed, the quest will be over and you'll be forced to explain yourself to the Queen. {{-}} ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_Huana_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_04_The_Wahaki.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Fruitful Alliance''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Queen Onekaza has asked me to recruit the Wahaki tribe to her cause. Though confrontational and divisive, she feels that the tribe will prove a critical ally in the contentious days ahead. |- | rowspan="6" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Travel to Ori o Koīki to speak with the Wahaki chieftain.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The tribe can be found on Ori o Koīki, a fiercely protected island of dense jungle, to the northwest of Neketaka . |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | The queen cautioned me that the Wahaki have a violent history and have done terrible things to survive the Deadfire's volatile climate. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | Ori o Koīki - the "Cursed Land of Corpses" - is named for the abundance of koīki (corpsefruit) trees and rumors of Engwithan ruins in the deeper jungle. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | The queen told me the passphrase that will identify her herald to the Wahaki. It is "over crumbling mountains, across blighted seas." |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | The queen intends to unite the Huana into the imperial power they were in days of old. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak with the Wahaki chieftain.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Now that I have arrived on Ori o Koīki, the Wahaki chieftain may want to hear Onekaza's offer. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Deal with the Crookspur slavers.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | Ruāsare asked me to dispatch the slavers of Crookspur, an island to the northwest of Neketaka. This was her condition for earning the trust of the Wahaki. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''4''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Ori o Koīki.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10004 | Now that the Crookspur slavers have been dealt with it, Ruāsare will want to learn of my progress. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''5''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Queen Onekaza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10005 | Now that I have forged an alliance with the Wahaki, Queen Onekaza will desire my full report. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''7''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Queen Onekaza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10007 | The Wahaki tribe will not be fighting alongside the Kahanga any time soon. Though she may not be pleased, Queen Onekaza will want to hear of it. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''12''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak to Ruāsare about an alliance.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10012 | I need to return to Ori o Koīki and propose the offer of an alliance between the Wahaki and the Huana to Ruāsare. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20007 | The Wahaki refuse to consider an alliance so long as the slavers at Crookspur remain a threat. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Somebody critical to the completion of this quest has been killed |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I succeeded in recruiting the Wahaki to Queen Onekaza's cause. The Huana's strength in the Deadfire should grow significantly. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | Negotiations with the Wahaki turned violent. The tribe will not be joining Queen Onekaza's cause. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30003 | My negotiations with the Wahaki were unsuccessful. Queen Onekaza will have to do without the tribe's aid. |}
